name: Witches
description: A young witch sets out to bring light to the night sky again. This single-screen platformer has the player controlling the witch and her magic wand. The space key sprays light into the sky; the player can also aim the wand and move left and right, as well as jump over the stray cat wandering the stage. While the player tries to paint the sky light, a rival witch darkens it again. When the timer runs out, the player wins if more than half the sky is light.

shot.caption: Pressing space shoots out sparks that light up the sky!
The rival is shooting down darkness at the same time the player is spreading light.
The patterns can get really pretty.
The rival's cat can trip your character, temporarily taking away her controls.
Didn't fill up more of the sky than the rival - game over.
